Element.name: Process
Element.Description: A <a href="/Concepts/Elements/Process"/> describes a sequence or flow of activities in an organization with the objective of carrying out work. A <a href="/Concepts/Elements/Process/CommonElements/Lane"/> represents a role participant in the Process.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property:
Defines the order of the lanes.

The Sort button opens the , which allows to change the lane order.
The set of information flowing through the activities of the process. The Edit button opens the Process Parameter dialog, which allows to add, edit and remove the parameters.
